meta.label: data partitioning and emailing
meta.description: This plugin provides three recipe components for partitioning data into files and emailing data partitions. The data-partition recipe component allows you to save data partitions as CSV/EXCEL files into a folder. The emailing recipe component lets you to email the data partitions as CSV files or embedded HTML tables to recipients.The write-data-partitions-to-excel-sheets recipe component allows you to write data partition to multiple sheets on a single Excel file.
meta.author: Dataiku (Neba Nfonsang)
